name: Topsong
tagline: An iOS app that allows you share your favourite 3 songs with your friends.
body:
### Thanks For Visiting TopSong.
This app was made for the soul purpose to find songs you might like and learn your friends musical tastes.  If you have question on the app please let me know.

### Support or Contact
Eric Hodgins (hodgins.e@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
